howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.objectiveText: The goal of the game is to have the most coins at the end of 5 rounds. You earn coins by managing your income and making smart investments.
howToPlay.round: The game is played in 5 rounds. Each round consists of an allocation phase and an event phase.
howToPlay.allocation: In the allocation phase, you decide how to spend your income. You can allocate it to Food/Housing, Short-term Investments, Long-term Investments, and an Emergency Fund.
howToPlay.events: In the event phase, a random event will occur. Some events are good, some are bad. You may need to make decisions to resolve them.
howToPlay.investments: Short-term and Long-term investments generate additional income each round. The more you invest, the more you earn.
howToPlay.longTermBonus: At the end of the game, you will receive a bonus based on your total Long-term investments.
howToPlay.winningText: The player with the most coins at the end of the 5th round wins the game.
